00121             const string &Name="", EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0);

00127     IAEA_PhspSource(EGS_Input *, EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0);

00130     EGS_I64 getNextParticle(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm,
00131             int &q, int &latch, EGS_Float &E, EGS_Float &wt,
00132             EGS_Vector &x, EGS_Vector &u);
00133     void setSimulationChunk(EGS_I64 nstart, EGS_I64 nrun);
00134     EGS_Float getEmax() const { return Emax; };
00135     EGS_Float getFluence() const {
00136         double aux = ((double) Nread)/((double) Nparticle);
00137         return Pinc*aux;
00138     };
00139     bool storeState(ostream &data) const {
00140         data << endl;
00141         bool res = egsStoreI64(data,Nread); if( !res ) return res; data << "  ";
00142         res = egsStoreI64(data,Nfirst); if( !res ) return res; data << "  ";
00143         res = egsStoreI64(data,Nlast); if( !res ) return res; data << "  ";
00144         res = egsStoreI64(data,Npos); if( !res ) return res; data << "  ";
00145         res = egsStoreI64(data,count); if( !res ) return res; data << "  ";
00146         return res;
00147     };
00148     bool setState(istream &data) {
00149         first = false;
00150         bool res = egsGetI64(data,Nread); if( !res ) return res;
00151         res = egsGetI64(data,Nfirst); if( !res ) return res;
00152         res = egsGetI64(data,Nlast); if( !res ) return res;
00153         res = egsGetI64(data,Npos); if( !res ) return res;
00154         Npos++;
00155         iaea_set_record(&iaea_fileid,&Npos,&iaea_iostat);
00156         res = egsGetI64(data,count); return res;
00157     };
00158     bool addState(istream &data) {
00159         EGS_I64 tmp_Nread = Nread, tmp_count = count;
00160         bool res = setState(data);
00161         Nread += tmp_Nread; count += tmp_count;
00162         return res;
00163     };
00164     void resetCounter() { Nread = 0; count = 0; };
00165 
00166     bool isValid() const { return is_valid; };
00167 
00168     void setCutout(EGS_Float xmin, EGS_Float xmax, EGS_Float ymin,
00169             EGS_Float ymax) {
00170         Xmin = xmin; Xmax = xmax; Ymin = ymin; Ymax = ymax;
00171     };
00172     void setFilter(int, int, int, const int *);
